Brand Owner & In-House Perfumer

HOLYNOSE (perfume brand / olfactive agency / art group, in-house perfumer / creative director / co-owner, RU):
formulas and concepts for all fragrances and collaborations
2017 — now

Selected reviews and press about HOLYNOSE:

  • This Tresor-Scented Perfume Will Make You Smell Like A Dark And Industrial Berlin Techno Dungeon (Electronic Beats, INT/EN)
  • How to start a perfume business in Russia: interview with HOLYNOSE (SRSLY, RU)

Also mentioned in:

  • The Blueprint 100: Russia’s best in beauty industry (The Blueprint, RU)
